metadata.title: CVE-2024-8387 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 129, Firefox ESR 128.1, andThunderbird 128.1. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruptionand we presume that with enough effort some of these could have beenexploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 130,Firefox ESR < 128.2, and Thunderbird < 128.2.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
